mapper.select: SELECT CONSULT_SCHEDULE_ID, CONSULT_SCHEDULE.CUSTOMER_ID, customer_info.customer_name, CUSTOMER_INFO.CUSTOMER_GENDER, CUSTOMER_INFO.CUSTOMER_BIRTH, CUSTOMER_INFO.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS,CUSTOMER_INFO.CUSTOMER_PHONE, CONSULT_DATE, CONSULT_CONTENT FROM CONSULT_SCHEDULE JOIN CUSTOMER_INFO ON(CONSULT_SCHEDULE.CUSTOMER_ID = CUSTOMER_INFO.CUSTOMER_ID) WHERE CONSULT_DATE BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{finish_date} ORDER BY CONSULT_DATE
